Title: arrayPushBack
Description: Adds one item to the end of the array.

array – Array.single_value – A single value. Only numbers can be added to an array with numbers, and only strings can be added to an array of strings. When adding numbers, ClickHouse automatically sets the single_value type for the data type of the array. For more information about the types of data in ClickHouse, see “Data types”. Can be NULL. The function adds a NULL element to an array, and the type of array elements converts to Nullable.
